resumo.titulo: Full Stack Developer, Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science - UTFPR

sobre.texto: I have experience in the industry since the end of 2021 when i started my internship as a developer, working with PHP. However, i started coding my first web applications in mid-2018 using Node.js. I've been using Node.js and React ever since, both at work and on personal projects. In 2015, i started my undergraduate course in Computer Science, where i was able to deepen my knowledge in algorithms, data structures, object orientation, networks, distributed systems, compilers, security and many other disciplines that increased my experience as a developer. Despite all the difficulties and problems along the way, I managed to complete my course in June 2023. I recently passed the AWS certification exam. Also, i have been interested in NextJs, Docker, Kubernetes and DevOps. My hobbies are listening to music and watching football.

projetos.descricao: Worked as a developer in Chatbot Application.
Worked as a developer in ERP System.
pontos: Implementation of a new layout for ecommerce (HTML, CSS, JS)

projetos.descricao: Responsible for the Full-Stack development of an Electronic Signature App.
pontos: Use of agile methodologies to manage the project

projetos.descricao: Responsible for the Front-End development of an application for a dental clinic using React and Typescript
Development and maintenance of websites and blogs, using PHP, CodeIgniter and MySQL.
